channel.title: A Fitness Minute
channel.itunes:author: Pat Anderson
channel.description: Her highly acclaimed radio show, A Fitness Minute with Pat Anderson, is aired on 100 stations across the country. NOW, you can download her daily one minute health, fitness and nutrition tips for FREE. Who has the time to read all that information on health? A Fitness Minute gives you the info you need in just 60 seconds! Concise, entertaining and always informative.
